query: Could you please craft a 5-day travel itinerary for two people, taking off from Fort Lauderdale and stopping by two cities in New York from March 8th to March 12th, 2022? Our budget is set at $4,000. We require accommodations that are pet-friendly and should ideally be private rooms. Also, note we won't be opting for self-driving as a mode of transportation.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Islip,Syracuse]
